1.21.name: wordpress/skysa-twitter-follow-app
1.21.description:
Simply set the Twitter account you want users to follow; then, when they click the Twitter Follow button at the bottom of your site, they will start following your account on Twitter. You can optionally set to display your current followers count next to the Twitter follow button and also the language of the Twitter follow button text.

More Skysa App plugins -|||- Skysa App Bar Integration plugin
